trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Watertown
There were no other sightings in Watertown on or around August 3rd 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsFrom our home, loooking to the northwest, over the horizon, a "flickering" light (not flashing) was in the sky and at times would move...kind of like watching a kite in the sky react to wind. We initially thought the light was a tower or a plane, but it moved enough not to be a tower and when it did move, it moved too quickly and directionally to be a plane. After about 35 minutes, it was no longer there. I moved from one window to the front porch and back to the window and when I moved back to the window, it had disappeared. I do not know if it was because clouds moved in fron of it or not....at this point the clouds are still there.
